dict.acceptation: 相信；以为，认为；对…信以为真；信任；

sent.orig: Words like" believe" and "receive" are a source of confusion in spelling.
sent.trans: 诸如 believe和 receive 这样的词在拼写上容易混淆。

sent.orig: Believe in fairy tale, believe in magic, believe in dream, believe in Heroes.
sent.trans: 相信童话，相信魔术，相信梦幻，相信有超能力的人。

sent.orig: Let him be; I believe what I believe, and others can believe what they like.
sent.trans: 随他便吧！我相信我所相信的，别人也可以相信他们所喜欢的。

sent.orig: Go against the grain. Don't believe in other people's visions for you, believe in your own.
sent.trans: 对抗迟疑。不要相信别人对你的期盼，相信你自己的。

sent.orig: I don' t believe in ghosts, ie don' t believe that they exist.
